extension.name: Content - Bad Word Filter
extension.author: Christopher Mavros
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 Christopher Mavros. All rights reserved.
extension.description: A simple word filter plugin. Produces a user-defined HTML if it finds a bad word

field.name: bad_words
field.label: Bad Words
field.description: Words to filter out, separated by commas. Example: porn,sex

field.name: html_out
field.label: HTML Replacement
field.description: The HTML produced when a word is found. CAUTION: This is 'raw' output (i.e. what you put here is what is outputted onto the page, exactly!)

field.name: allow_exceptions
field.label: Allow Exceptions
field.description: If this is yes, BWF will not replace words in articles that contain the keyword {no_badwordfilter}.
